p: The 3-day-old neonatal mice were i.m. inoculated with 100 LD 50 of CVA4 YT226R strain (10 4.0 TCID 50/mouse) and mice with a clinical score of ≥4 were anaesthetized with ether and sacrificed. The lungs, hind limb muscles, spinal muscles and heart were separated, fixed, dehydrated, permeabilized and embedded in paraffin, which was then sliced into 4 μm sections. After staining with haematoxylin and eosin, histopathological analysis was performed.
